Description:
STANDARD MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONSEducation:Advanced university degree or university degree in Geographic Information Systems (GIS), Computer science or other relevant fields is preferable. Experience:    Profound experience working with GIS software ArcGIS 10.x, Quantum GIS and other Open Source software knowledge is an asset.
Minimum of one year of relevant professional experience in the field of Geographic Information Systems. 
Six years of total professional experience. 
Data analysis experience and data modelling is an advantage.Knowledge and skills:Strong knowledge of spatial analysis and geocoding techniques.
Good knowledge of end-to-end supply chain management is an advantage.
Advanced GIS and geospatial data management skills.
knowledge of ArcPy for GIS workflow automation is an asset.
Strong Microsoft Office 365 skills.
Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, both orally and in writing.
Ability to work independently and within a team.Language:   Fluency (level C) in English language, written, spoken and oral comprehension is a must.
Fluency in Arabic language is a must. Job Details
